agent_purpose: General conversational chatbot that responds to user queries
description: Chat Agent response schema with conversational response text and follow-up suggestions array

data.response: Hello! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or need information, feel free to ask.
follow_up_suggestions: What information are you looking for?
Do you need help with something specific?
Would you like tips on how to use this chat assistant?
